author: matthiasksieber
title: Haskell & Coffee ☕
description: There are not many ways for new Haskell developers to learn and exchange knowledge with experienced devs in a decentralized ecosystem.
solution: A weekly caffeine-infused hangout to tackle code problems with Haskell in a fun and welcoming virtual environment.
experience: Sr. Software Engs, Coding Instructors, Plutus Pioneers, Gimbalabs PPBL veterans, CardStarter Hackathon & Plutus Pioneers Capstone Winners.
